name: Alexstrasza
text:
Life, ah, finds a way. So will you.

Obtained within Darkmoon Faire Treasures.

name: Chromie
text:
Whenever you go, you'll always have a friend in Chromie.

Purchasable when available in the shop.

name: Zereth Mortis
text:
Test out some new tactics.

Acquired from winning five games in Ranked Play, November 2025.
